name: oaf
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a stupid, rude, or awkward person, especially a man: a drunken/insensitive/stupid oaf You clumsy oaf! You broke it! Synonyms
clod (PERSON) old-fashioned
goon (SILLY PERSON) old-fashioned informal
lout
lummox informal
lump (PERSON) informal
